title: CBI Instructions for Exchanging Dinars

title: Iraq bets on tourism to reduce oil dependence
description:
BAGHDAD, Nov. 24 (Xinhua) -- Iraq aims to raise cultural tourism revenue to 30 percent of its state budget to diversify an economy that currently relies on oil for 95 percent of its funding, a senior ministry official said on Monday.

Deputy Minister of Culture, Tourism, and Antiquities Fadel al-Bad...

title: CBI Denies Dinar Revaluation Rumours as Inflation Falls
description:
By John Lee.

The Central Bank of Iraq (CBI) has said that its monetary policies have pushed inflation to historically low levels, adding that there is no intention to amend the exchange rate of the Iraqi dinar (IQD).

In a statement issued on Monday (24th November), the bank rejected rumours of a p...
